tool_description: Retrieves comprehensive nutritional information for food ingredients from nutritional databases, returning macro and micronutrient profiles per 100g.

ingredient_name.description: Name of the food ingredient to look up

error_messages: Ingredient not found: The specified ingredient is not available in the selected database. Try alternative names or different database sources.
Invalid database source: Use one of [USDA, NCCDB, local]. Check spelling and capitalization.
Database connection error: Unable to access nutritional database. Verify internet connection and try again.
usage: Provide ingredient_name and optionally specify database_source. Returns complete nutritional profile including calories, macronutrients, vitamins, and minerals per 100g.

vitamins_mg.description: Vitamin content values in mg per 100g

minerals_mg.description: Mineral content values in mg per 100g
